body: Mighty African attended a Stanford Africa Forum event called "Entrepreneurship and Development: Doing Business in a Frontier Market": "I went to the mobile technology panel. An issue was raised, "Why can't people selling crafts, etc in Africa get to participate in e-commerce? This is a case for mobile money."

title: Africa: Entrepreneurship and development in frontier markets
